messages.subject: welcome/intro.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/24/02 3:55:27 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/24/02 3:55:27 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Respectful parenting and interpersonal communication are my passions. I've
been studying these since childhood and used to know a lot about them :-).
Almost daily i am discovering how little I truly know, how often i screw up
(and my teen confirms this :-)), how much parenting is really mostly about
*me* growing, how much i still want to learn about practising respect and
compassion. I'm excited about that journey! >>

I really think you'll like it here.
It's changed my life for the better, and my childrens!! Welcome.

Ren
